abstract: An article on Monday about the sale of films at the Sundance Film Festival misidentified the corporation that owns Rainbow Media Holdings and IFC, among the most active buyers at this year’s festival. Rainbow Media Holdings and IFC are part of Cablevision Systems, not Comcast.

lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about the sale of films at the Sundance Film Festival misidentified the corporation that owns Rainbow Media Holdings and IFC, among the most active buyers at this year’s festival. Rainbow Media Holdings and IFC are part of Cablevision Systems, not Comcast.
